author: Cedric Canard
content: I too like photographing advertising posters and have often wondered why. I have come to the conclusion that in my case, it is often just wanting to photograph a photo that looks good in the hope of making my own photo look good by association (at least on some subconscious level). Does that make sense? However, as you have done here, I do try to add something of my own using composition. So that I don't feel like a total cheat ðŸ™‚
